attributes.action: make the long term unemployed find work or lose benefits completely
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this isnt for the workers that are unfortunately being made unemployed recently due to redundancies. i am talking about career claiments who have never worked but are allowed to fleece the tax payer without any pressure from the authorities. take away there full entitlement to any benefits and force them to find work. if they cant find private sector work lets have them sweep the streets doing pensioners gardens and then give them some benefits.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
